Regulation 2020/741/EU on minimum requirements for water reuse, paragraph (2), reads: ‘The
Union’s ability to respond to the increasing pressures on water resources could be improved by
wider reuse of treated waste water, limiting extraction from surface water bodies and
groundwater bodies, reducing the impact of discharge of treated waste water into water bodies,
and promoting water savings through multiple uses for urban waste water, while ensuring a high
